description: This table contains the Medication information for the Surgical Log (ORL).

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Line (ORM) record

columns.name: MEDICATION_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The number of units for the med.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: MEDICATION_ROUTE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The route of the med.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: MEDICATION_SITE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The site of the med.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: MED_SITE_LATER_C_NAME
columns.description:
The laterality of the site.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Left


Right


Bilateral


N/A


Default
